__e: I have a missing girl who may be dead already, Inspector.
Sir, you don't believe one goddamn thing I said, right?
Well, all due respect, Inspector, but I don't know how you can have information on a murder when we do not know who our murder victim is or how or where she was killed.
Inspector Drake, it is an old habit, but let us go call on Mr. Best once more.
Inspector Drake, it is you who's ordered a manhunt,
No, I told you, Inspector Drake. And you would not hear it from me.
There might have been a DCI back in the day.
I actually don't mind what he calls me, Chief Inspector.
Of all the days you could have come, Senior Inspector...
He said he were a police inspector.
There's a police inspector at the door. He wants to speak to you.
"We" don't do anything, Andy. Only one of us is a police detective.

There's a police inspector at the door. He wants to speak to you.
"We" don't do anything, Andy. Only one of us is a police detective.
I've never seen another. What... wait, one safety inspector?
Well, as safety inspector, he hasn't exactly set the world on fire, although he came close several times.

And I wouldn't want an inspector in this office who would be.
Oh, there's a man over there from the D.A.'s office, too. He's looking for you.
